entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Thursday 16 March 2023
